name: Scott Howard
title: Senior DevOps Engineer at Liatrio
summary: Senior DevOps Engineer with 10+ years of experience designing, developing, and testing innovative application and DevOps solutions in Agile environments. Demonstrated ability to apply technical and leadership skills to work efficiently and professionally in dynamic environments on both team-centric and solo assignments. Well-rounded individual with diverse experience in both the technical and business spectrums, with 6 years of Software Engineering experience and 4 years of DevOps Engineering experience. Specializing in cloud architecture, CI/CD design and development, and company culture development with an empathy-driven and forward-thinking approach.
